subject: English
title: English for Beginners
shortDescription: Learn basic English skills for everyday conversation.
fullDescription: This comprehensive course covers all the fundamental skills needed to communicate in English including speaking, listening, reading, and writing. Ideal for beginners starting from zero.

subject: English
title: Advanced English Grammar
shortDescription: Master complex English grammar rules and usage.
fullDescription: Dive deep into advanced grammar concepts such as conditionals, passive voice, reported speech, and nuanced sentence structures. Perfect for those looking to polish their English writing and speaking skills.

subject: Mathematics
title: Basic Algebra
shortDescription: Understand the fundamentals of algebra including variables and equations.
fullDescription: Dive deep into algebraic concepts such as expressions, equations, functions, and graphing. This course lays a strong foundation for higher-level math courses.

subject: Science
title: Introduction to Biology
shortDescription: Explore the basics of biology, including cells, genetics, and ecosystems.
fullDescription: This course introduces the principles of biology, covering cell structure, genetics, evolution, and ecological systems. Perfect for students new to science.

subject: History
title: World History Overview
shortDescription: A broad overview of world history from ancient to modern times.
fullDescription: Explore key events, civilizations, and cultural shifts throughout world history, from ancient civilizations to contemporary global issues.

subject: Computer Science
title: Introduction to Programming
fullDescription: Get started with programming by learning Python syntax, control structures, functions, and basic algorithms. No prior experience needed.
